features: Rosy Tone Moisturizer: This rich, non-greasy, fragrance-free face moisturizer renews and revives a blushed rosy tone from within while hydrating for smooth, renewed skin with a healthy and rosy complexion

Exfoliate and Revive: Features Imperial Peony Extracts and LHA to gently exfoliate dull, sallow skin and revive natural rosy tone; Free of parabens and mineral oil; Allergy tested, non-sticky, dermatologist tested and suitable for sensitive skin
Renew Mature Skin: As skin matures its ability to renew surface cells slows down, causing a build up of dead skin cells on the surface that hide the natural pink tone and give skin a dull appearance

Age Perfect Skincare: This line for mature skin includes gentle cleansers, lightweight oils and serums, and anti-aging creams and lotions to restore and revive skin, with nourishing ingredients designed to leave you looking radiant
L'Oreal Paris Beauty: A leading total beauty care company based in Paris, we offer innovative products and unique expertise from beauty experts in makeup, skin care, hair care, styling and hair color
body.description: L'Oreal Paris age Perfect rosy tone fragrance free moisturizer is a rich, non-greasy daily Moisturizing cream for mature skin. As skin matures, its ability to renew surface cells slows down. This can cause a buildup of dead cells on the surface of your skin-hiding its natural pink tone. The formula with Imperial peony extracts and LHA gently exfoliates dull, sallow skin to revive skin's natural rosy tone. This daytime moisturizer revives skin's natural pink tone. Immediately skin is hydrated and looks healthier. Skin feels smoother and looks rejuvenated. After 4 weeks of using rosy tone face moisturizer, skin appears renewed and skin is visibly younger.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get Your Rosy Tone Back As skin matures, its ability to renew surface cells slows down, causing a build up of dead skin cells on the surface. As a result, the natural pink tone is hidden and completion becomes dull, losing its natural rosy tone of youth. Age Perfect Rosy Tone Moisturizer exfoliates dull, sallow skin and revives skin's natural rosy tone. This moisturizer is an intense daily moisturizing cream enhanced with rosy pigments to instantly revive skin's rosy tone.

What changes should I expect in my skin after 50? Around age 55, the oil production of our skin diminishes by 40%, which contributes to the dryness and discomfort most women experience around this age. In addition, circulation and cell turn over slow down, leading to dullness and lack of rosy color. What happens to skin at night and should I be using products at night to help support it? At night, skin repairs itself. Night creams that provide nourishing and exfoliating actives can help to repair barrier function while removing dull, dead skin cells to promotes faster cell turnover and renewed rosy radiance. Does skin age faster during and after menopause? No. Our skin has a “roadmap” for its ageing since we are born. That roadmap is affected by external factors, like sun, smoke, pollution and internal factors such as nutrition, sleep, stress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong scent from Methyldihydrojasmonate
reviews.reviewText: I have never used anything by L’Oreal, but I recently ran out of my Glossier FutureDew, and after reordering I realized there would be a few days I’d be without my “dewy glow” for more days than I want to be. Even though I barely wear makeup during this COViD isolation, I try to keep my skin looking fresh and healthy for my husband and kids. Anyways, I looked for something to hold me over till my FutureDew comes in, and, for the price, I figured it wouldn’t hurt to try this stuff. I bought the “fragrance-free” because I generally don’t like scent on my face. I hadn’t read the ingredients before I tried it, but upon application I immediately recognized the scent of Methyldihydrojasmonate, which I am familiar with from using Nia24 Skin Strengthening Complex. It’s not a bad scent, but it’s quite strong, and I can’t have it near my eyes.As far as the product performance goes; it’s basically a very lightly tinted moisturizer that adds a touch of warm pink coloring to skin. I love the texture! It’s thick, but it’s not greasy or heavy. It coats the skin evenly and smoothly, and it stays put. I am really glad I purchased this, because it looks and feels great on my face and neck. It gives my whole look a “pick me up”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Facial cream I have ever used
reviews.reviewText: I have been using both the L'Oreal Rosie Day Cream and their night cream for years. I'm fair skinned and have dry skin. I also hate wearing foundation so the Rosy Tone Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer gives me a beautiful, youthful, healthy rosy glow. Not too pink just healthy. And the smell as devine. I love it so much I much I even scrape the bottle clean with a Q-tip to make sure I've used it all. ;)

reviews.reviewTitle: J'utilise ce produit depuis plusieurs années ❤️
reviews.reviewText: Redonne du teint, hydrate et n'est pas grasse

This is nice lotion, it has some stuff in it that isn't the best for skin and that's a big reason why I gave it 4 stars. It's really expensive for something with fillers and other stuff in it.Having said that, it's nice enough. I bought it a lot for the peony, I love Korean cosmetics and I was excited to find that this had a lot of things in it that Japanese and Korean high end cosmetics use. It also has some cutting edge peptides in it and some other good things too.I almost gave it 3 stars because of the color. I was among the many who thought the color would be cool, it wasn't. I mostly use it around my eyes and it's not helpful there at all. I use a massage tool that heats up and thankfully it helps me to use less of the lotion and therefore less of the color. The color does nothing XD it doesn't add a healthy glow to cheeks, it's really incredibly somehow useless, I'm not sure why at all. It's not a very good pink, maybe it's because it's kind of an orangey color.I think if you have the sort of coloring that goes well with orange, you'll be one of the people who writes a 5 star review for this product. I have skin that likes pink and tends to go well with pink. The fillers and other sub-par chemicals in this mean that there are other products out there that can do better for less. This isn't a bad product, but it's not the best and it isn't worth it for this price tag.
No foundation needed if fair to light skin tone. Good moisturizing.
